directions: Mince and mash garlic to a paste with 1 teaspoon salt. Purée remaining ingredients with garlic paste in food processor until almost smooth. Season with salt.
ingredients: 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon tomato paste (one 6-ounce can or a little less)
1 (12-ounce) jar roasted red peppers, rinsed and patted dry
1 (5-inch) piece of baguette, crust discarded, bread torn into pieces (1 rounded cup)
1/3 cup finely chopped cilantro or parsley
baguette slices, pita toasts, or crackers
title: Turkish-Style Tomato and Red-Pepper Spread
